item.description:
BriefDating for Western Massachusetts
Giving Serendipity a Helping Hand

Cost: $30 (payment details at BriefDating.com)


BriefDating--A Great New Way to Meet People!

* Meet many singles, quickly and easily
At our Western Mass speed dating events you
will have between 7 and 17 dates in one fun evening.

* Get a sense if you "click" in a few minutes
Each brief date is just 7 minutes.

* Safe and no pressure
You don't ask each other out. You just mark on your
Dating Card if you like the person. Contact information
is only sent when there is a match.

* BriefDating Works!
Our events have a 60% to 80% match rate!

For more information and to sign up:
http://www.briefdatin...

Please note: pre-registration and pre-payment is required. No walk-ins allowed. Please see BriefDating.com for details.

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Speed Dating in Northampton - BriefDating for Western Mass!
